attributes.action: Activity/play center Disability evenings to be held at a earlier time.
attributes.background:
We appreciate many activity centres doing a disability evening, but it's the times there being held at 6pm til 8pm.
Our son is 4 and would benifet from them all but his sleep routine begins at 6pm for his sleep disorder.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of the centre who is organising the event and not the UK Government or Parliament.
